title: 4 v 5 from the start should result in less LP loss if any at all
body: Had another ranked game where our jungler didn't even connect resulting in a 4 v 5 from the start. Can we please not lose as much if any LP at all for when this happens. It is not fair and is a pretty significant problem. Is this being looked into?

replies.body: Game shouldn't start if all players don't connect, player that doesn't connect should be awarded a penalty similar to dodging to stop abuse.
